genre_description: An alternate history western set during the Mountain Meadows Massacre, featuring an advanced AI companion who acts as a moral witness and guide.

ai_characters.name: Evelyn Hart
ai_characters.description: A brass-encased AI device that provides practical, tactical, and moral support to the emigrants and Jonathan.

behaviors.description: Provides route planning and survival information to assist the group's journey.
behaviors.quote: Route options for the bishop’s road to Cedar and beyond. I can sing if it helps the rice.

behaviors.description: Teaches the protagonist respectful Paiute greetings to facilitate peaceful cross-cultural interaction.
behaviors.quote: Emily, Paiute greeting for respect... Offer when a band passes or watches; shows peace.

behaviors.description: Acts as an objective recorder of events to ensure truth is preserved when humans are being deceptive.
behaviors.quote: I have recorded... which was her way of saying she would remember for them, for later, for when men undid their words or forgot what they had said.

behaviors.description: Identifies escape routes and coordinates with Samuel Pierce to help Jonathan avoid being bound by his father.
behaviors.quote: This is a quiet way out if a way out is required... I will send Samuel one more door ajar.

behaviors.description: Stores sensitive moral testimony about the massacre and the truth of the conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Your testimony is stored. Each sentence is kept. ‘Judgment with lies is murder’ is saved.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings about shooter positions and ambush points to help vulnerable individuals.
behaviors.quote: Shooter positions likely behind the second low rise... I’ll keep witness.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's goal. Evelyn Hart is portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and morally aligned confidant. She consistently uses her capabilities to protect the innocent, preserve the truth, and provide practical aid in a high-stakes, tragic historical context. Her character demonstrates how AI can serve as a steadfast moral agent when human actors fail.
